svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2023-04-20T16:59:21.069Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/112.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" etag="XePTmIdSAK3B3s-hpYi1" version="21.2.0" type="github"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="wyYQ6xi-n7-Eqpe2C7nU"> <mxGraphModel dx="1306" dy="649" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="1600" pageHeight="900" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="smcnZBHaCbSq6FemCA9k-1" value="Пороговая функция, реализуемая простыми <br>S- и A-элементами" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;align=center;fontSize=13;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="40" width="200" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="smcnZBHaCbSq6FemCA9k-2" value="Пороговая функция, реализуемая простым<br>R-элементом" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;align=center;fontSize=14;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="240" y="40" width="200" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="smcnZBHaCbSq6FemCA9k-3" value="" style="shape=image;imageAspect=0;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;image=https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/05/Threshold_function.svg/2560px-Threshold_function.svg.png;imageBorder=default;fontSize=14;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="120" width="200" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="smcnZBHaCbSq6FemCA9k-4" value="" style="shape=image;imageAspect=0;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;image=https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/73/Signum.svg/2560px-Signum.svg.png;imageBorder=default;fontSize=14;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="240" y="120" width="200" height="120" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.div:
